mapper.sql: user_id, user_name, password, phone, email, real_name, card_id, sex, birthday, user_address, work, user_note
mapper.select: select * from user where user_name=#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and password=#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select phone from user where phone=#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.update:
update user
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
card_id = #{cardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
user_address = #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
work = #{work,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_note = #{userNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
